element.value: I'll talk to you later.
Nice to see you, I'll be going now.
[walk away]
I'll catch you later.
Hey sorry, but I got to go right now.
What are you doing?
Just walking around in circles, doing nothing really!
That sounds fun.
It really is!
That's kinda weird.
Don't judge me.
I'm judging you hardcore
Leave me!
Wait one second...
Leave me!
I _____ _____ what you are _____.

element.answer: I don't like what you are doing.

element.value: No, No, where did I put that textbook?
What book are you looking for?
I'm looking for my medical dictionary. Oh, where is it?
I think I saw it on the bookshelf
Ah, I take another look over there. Thanks!
What do you do in the lab?
I specialize in preventative medicine, and I am currently working on a vaccine for the common cold.
Wow, that sounds awesome!
One day mankind will live without fear of getting a cold. But until then, I must find that textbook
This homework is really boring.
Why don't you take a break?
I have to finish this assignment by tonight, or else I won't get to watch TV.
Good luck. I hear there's a new episode of 'Superboy' tonight.
Oh man, I had better finish quickly then! I'll see you tomorrow.
Wow, it's really nice outside today!
Yeah, the flowers are really pretty too.
Ah, I really love Spring.
Welcome to the Pallet Town Lab. How may I help you?
What is this place?
This is one of the world's greatest research facilities
How come I've never heard of it?
You're too young to know, but one day you will understand.
Cool. What are you guys working on?
We're building a robot that helps people learn English.
What do you do here?
I am the head scientist here, and I oversee the laboratory.
Can you make me a potion to turn me into a dragon?
Ah sorry, we just ran out of dragon juice. Maybe next time.
Someday, I wanna be a scientist too!
That's great to hear! Study hard, clean your room, and eat all your vegetables. Don't you understand how important those things are? I'm just typing words to fill up space.
Your glasses look funny.
I'm really busy, don't you have someone else to bother?
Hello there. How are you doing today?
I'm great! How about you?
Just waiting for my son to finish his homework.
Your House
Some other persons house
Pallet Town Square
Pallet Town Lab
